abstract: Larry Hagman, best know as the rapacious oil tycoon J.R. Ewing in the 1980s hit TV series “Dallas,” has finally settled his long-running arbitration claim against Citigroup.
snippet: Larry Hagman, best know as the rapacious oil tycoon J.R. Ewing in the 1980s hit TV series “Dallas,” has finally settled his long-running arbitration claim against Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: Christian Alminana/Agence France-Presse — Getty ImagesLarry Hagman reprising his best-known character, J.R. Ewing in “Dallas.”

headline.main: No More Messing With J.R.: Citi and Actor Reach Accord
